text: int main ( ) { int i , j , k , t , s , n ; long long int a [ 10001 ] ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { s = 0 ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) scanf ( "%lld" , & a [ i ] ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) if ( a [ i ] <= a [ i + 1 ] ) { j = i ; while ( a [ i ] < a [ i + 1 ] ) i ++ ; for ( k = 0 ; i - k - j != 0 ; k ++ ) s = s + ( i - j - k ) ; } printf ( "%d\n" , s + n ) ; } return 0 ; }
